posts.post_content:
Hi.

I am interested in acquiring both a Ty Cobb "bat off shoulder" and Nap Lajoie "with bat", with an interesting back, like Tolstoi or American Beauty, for example. The grades are of no consequence, only a nice eye appeal. 

To trade, I have a handful of some nice backs such as Uzit, Lenox etc. as well as some HOF players.

If anyone is interested, please feel free to shoot me a PM and I would be happy to try and work something out.

Thank you very much.

Derek
